summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx Express detailing transportation charges for a shipment. It includes information about discounts applied, total charges, and shipment details such as pickup and delivery dates. The invoice highlights the financial aspects of the shipment, including a fuel surcharge and the total amount due.

persons.name: Cecilia Jeffrey
persons.context: Cecilia Jeffrey is listed as the shipper for the FedEx shipment detailed in the invoice.

persons.name: A. Rodriguez
persons.context: A. Rodriguez is mentioned as the individual who expedited the shipment.

events.title: Shipment Pickup
events.description: The FedEx shipment was picked up on March 18, 2005.

events.title: Shipment Delivery
events.description: The FedEx shipment was delivered on March 21, 2005.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6843, US
6100 Red Hook Waters, St. Thomas 00802, VI
keyFacts: The total charges for the shipment amounted to USD 66.04.
A fuel surcharge of 8.50% was applied to the shipment.
The invoice indicates a discount of USD 1.88 was applied.
The shipment was picked up on March 18, 2005, and delivered on March 21, 2005.
Cecilia Jeffrey is identified as the shipper for the package.
